title: All-Party Conference today (23)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The All-Party Conference convened by President Gotabaya Rajapaksa will be held in Colombo at 10 a.m on Wednesday (23).
This All-Party Conference was convened on a proposal made by the Sri Lanka Freedom Party.
However, several parties currently represented in Parliament have decided NOT to attend the All Party Conference.
“I opposed to searching women in Hijab’ – Ranil reveals events on Easter Sunday
